question: I'm urgently looking for 5 pax of Interns in MRCSB Melaka for Measurement Department
answer: Job Scope Includes: 1)To assist Measurement Department for site and office related tasks 2)To assist Engineers in planning Preventive Maintenance and Reactive Maintenance 3)To assist Engineers in Process Analyzers Data correlation with Lab Data 4)To assist Engineers in Budgetary and CAPEX Document preparation 5)To assist Engineers in Project Execution 6)To assist Engineers in Preventive Maintenance Works in Plant Turn Around and Shut Down. 7)To proactively seeking tasks and provide support to Measurement Department members 8)To assist Documentation works such as information collection, communicate with different departments etc 9)To prepare Measurement Instruments Database such as datasheet, Engineering Drawings etc 10)To prepare Measurement Instruments presentation and slides 11)Willing to work extra hours if needed and able to work in Melaka 12) Proactive and Independent candidate is preferred 13) Minimum CGPA 3.0 and minimum duration 12 weeks and above 14) Degree background in Engineering

question: شباب شو موضوع هذا بالضبط ؟☝🏽
answer: For your information, starting from this semester, all students require to involve in co-curriculum activities as follows: ● ExCEL- Only valid for current Year 1 & 2 where students need to join a total of 3 programs that are offered in UTMACAD. These 3 activities are the prerequisite to enrol in ExCel subject which will begins starting from 202020212 session for SKEM. ● UTMSAT – Involves all Year 1 until Year 4 students. Students need to join the organized program and each activity will contribute to points. To pass this program, students need to join a minimum of 1 program which will be held every Tuesday along the 14 weeks’ time. To get an excellent transcript, student must join 3 programs on every Tuesday along the 14 weeks’ time. ● UTMSAT program differs from the normal 3 credit co-curriculum program (2+1). It is for all students. ● Normal 3 credit co-curriculum program --> Need to register and included into Academic Transcript ● UTMSAT- No credit ---> But Co-Curriculum Transcript will be issued (Pass: Moderate-Excellent) & the name of the transcript is UTMSAT. Therefore, student will get 2 scrolls during the convocation. ● In the other words, starting from this semester, for the students who did not registered for normal 3 credit co-curriculum program, they need to join the co-curriculum activities that are organized by UTM on every Tuesday from 2pm until 11pm.

question: What are the SOP's for online Final Examination?
answer: Listed below are the SOP's for online Final Examination which are applicable for subjects offered by SCEE only. There are 3 steps for the online final exam process. Step 1: Before exam (Fill in forms, eg. Form 1, Form 2, Form 3) Step 2: During exam (For exam longer than 90 minutes, exam will be divided into two sessions (eg. Part 1, Submit, Break, Part 2, Submit) Step 3: After exam

topic: Teaching and Learning Mode for Semester 1 2020/2021
question: What are the modes of Teaching and Learning for Semester 1 2020/2021?
answer: 1. Full Physical (Face to Face) - for courses that need 100% physical attendance such as industrial training, courses needing laboratories and more. 2. Blended Learning - courses are done online and some such as Service Learning are done face to face. Suggested that physical activities are to be done at the end of the semester. 3. Full Online Learning - applicable to courses that do not have the needs to undergo face to face learning, as well as courses with higher numbers of international students.
keywords: ['teaching and learning mode', 'semester 1 2020/2021', 'full physical', 'blended learning', 'full online learning']

question: What are the available YouTube playlists for engineering courses provided by YSAG?
answer: YSAG provides YouTube playlists for various engineering courses including EMT, Soil Mechanics, Mass Balance, Waste Water Engineering, Fluid Mechanics 1, Fluid Mechanics 2, Math 2, Solid Mechanics, and training workshops on writing systematic reviews and managing research work using Mendeley. Links to these playlists are provided in the message.
keywords: ['engineering courses', 'YouTube playlists', 'YSAG', 'EMT', 'Soil Mechanics', 'Mass Balance', 'Waste Water Engineering', 'Fluid Mechanics', 'Math 2', 'Solid Mechanics', 'training workshops']

question: What are the requirements for the volunteer position of Media Officer in YSAG?
answer: The requirements for the Media Officer position in YSAG include skills in designing posters for social media, ability to manage and market social media accounts, readiness to work flexibly and committedly, and being of Yemeni nationality. Interested candidates can contact Abdulrahman Alattas at +601137709211.

question: What is the Intern Experience Series by YSAG about?
answer: The Intern Experience Series by YSAG discusses the needs of students approaching internships and answers their queries. The series features interviews with professionals like Engineer Mohammed Asban and Engineer Omar Abu Al-Majd, and is produced by Omar Fahmy. Links to the episodes are provided in the messages.

question: What is the process for submitting the Degree Award Form for graduating students?
answer: Graduating students must fill in the Degree Award Form available at https://engineering.utm.my/chemicalenergy/resources-2/, have it signed by their Academic Advisor, attach a copy of their Identity Card/Passport, and email it to the respective department based on their course by June 3, 2021.

topic: Lecture on Software Trends and Job Market Experience
question: What will be discussed in the YSAG lecture on software trends and job market experience?
answer: The YSAG lecture titled 'Software Trends and Job Market Experience' will discuss how to utilize university careers to build a more professional resume, how to be qualified to meet market needs upon graduation, and the essential skills required for programmers in the job market. The lecture will be held on Zoom on April 26, 2021, from 3 PM to 4:30 PM.

answer: Safety: اخذتها مع جوهاري، مايشرح اي شيء. يقسم الطلاب لقروبات وكل قروب يشرح درس ويسوي كويز. بس اذا سويت الاسايمنتات وو يعطي درجة كويسة. CRE: اسمه مش موجود. Ana. Chemistry: اخذتها مع هاشم (اول واحد) مايسوى اي شيء وجاب اختبار ميد مررة صعب وهو ماشرح شي باختصار (مش كويس).

🌹Assalamualaikum and Greetings to all!🌹

💁‍♂️ We all know that Matlab is a numeric computing platform that helps engineers and scientists in data analyzing, developing algorithms or creating models. 

But the main question comes later in our mind, *How and where exactly do we start?* 🤔

It's our pleasure to inform you that ISS-YEMEN has arranged a three-days workshop on MATLAB programming 🤩✨.

We’ll be discussing the following topics:
Day 1: Introduction to MATLAB
Day 2: Introduction to Control Systems
Day 3: Introduction to SIMULINK

👨‍🏫 *Lectured by*: Abdullah Sharaf
🗓️ *Date*: 1-3 *April* 2022
🕘 *Time*: 10PM - 11PM (MYT) 
💻 *Platform*: Online
💰 *Fees*: Free 
🟡 *Matlab Version*: 2016 and above

🌟 Certificate and UTM merit will be provided.

⚠️ *SEATS ARE LIMITED*

We are welcoming you all to hop on and grab this opportunity 😆🔥!

For any inquiries, please contact:
Omar Batis
+601137771612
Mohammed Saeed
+601156741825

Registration link:
https://forms.gle/vHPraBZR8o8DnD439

answer:
يعلن YSAG عن فتح باب التقديم لخدمات YSAG الأكاديمية 👨🏻‍🎓📚

🔻 يمكنك المشاركة في:-

📍 التطوع و تقديم شرح لمواد علمية على قناتنا في اليوتيوب و أيضا مشاركة قوائم تشغيل مفيدة.

📍التطوع و تقديم كلاسات تقوية مباشرة للطلاب.

📍 التطوع في جمع الملفات مثل 
تست ١ ، تست ٢ ، فاينل و غيرها من الملفات القيمة التي تفيد الطلاب من خلال المكتبه الإلكترونية.

📍 واخيرا يمكنكم ايضا المساهمة في تقديم النصائح و الاقتراحات لأجل تطوير خدامتنا لكم.

📝 رابط المشاركة:
https://forms.gle/uJmVr6cx7o9Z4AF26

📳 للمزيد من المعلومات والخدمات الأكاديمية التي نوفرها لكم يمكنكم زيارتنا عبر الموقع الإلكتروني الخاص ب *YSAG*:
https://sites.google.com/view/ysag

⚠️ *كوننا ممثلين لكم أمام الجامعة لازم ناخذ رأيكم*

فيه تصويت على التلجرام ياريت الكل يشارك فيه بيساعدنا نعرف رغباتكم ونحاول نطالب فيها 

 _رابط مجموعة التلجرام في وصف المجموعة_

answer:
It is informed that the Center for Academic and Learning Experiences (CAEL) under the Graduate Institute for Available Life (UTM iLeague) is in the process of collecting statistical information on undergraduate students up to the 2021/22 cohort who have not yet taken general university courses.

Accordingly, students are required to fill out a questionnaire on student registration for general university courses. Updating the information in the google form must be done no later than April 20, 2022.

question: Kami dari Persatuan Mahasiswa Islam akan mengadakan program 'Study together With PMITUM' untuk membantu para pelajar mengatasi masalah-masalah tersebut. Ayuh sertai sekarang!!
answer: Program 'Study together With PMITUM' akan diadakan pada Isnin, 30 Januari 2023 di Dewan Al-Khawarizmi, Masjid Sultan Ismail. Akan membincangkan kertas soalan peperiksaan tahun-tahun lepas. Subjek yang bakal dibincangkan: Engineering Mathematics I, Engineering Mathematics II, Differential Equations. Untuk menyertai program ini, anda dikehendaki untuk mengisi google form di bawah: https://forms.gle/6CuGDw9W4XNUGbYy6. Sebarang pertanyaan: Zufayri - 010-334 8656, Aziean - 011-4018 0374.
